comments:
I got this in the log when shutting down Eclipse RC3.


java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: The 
class "org.eclipse.core.internal.plugins.InternalPlatform" cannot be loaded 
because the system is shutting down and the plug-
in "org.eclipse.core.runtime.compatibility" has already been stopped.

traces.message: The  class "org.eclipse.core.internal.plugins.InternalPlatform" cannot be loaded  because the system is shutting down and the plug- in "org.eclipse.core.runtime.compatibility" has already been stopped.
